ldccr 0.0.6.900
  • Reference

Overview

ldccr is utilities for various Japanese corpora.

The goal of ldccr package is to make easy to use Japanese language resources.

This package provides:

  1. parsers for several Japanese corpora that are free or open licensed (non proprietary).
  2. downloader of zipped text files published on Aozora Bunko.

Supported Corpora

Monolingual

… Name License Link
:heavy_check_mark: Live Door News Corpus CC BY-ND 2.1 JP #
:no_entry: Japanese Realistic Textual Entailment Corpus CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 #
❌ JEITA Public Morphologically Tagged Corpus (in ChaSen format) Unknown #
❌ Kyoto University and NTT Blog Corpus (KNB Corpus) 3-clause BSD license #

Multilingual

Currently not supported.

Download text file from Aozora Bunko

if (!dir.exists("cache")) dir.create("cache")

text <- ldccr::AozoraBunkoSnapshot %>%
  dplyr::sample_n(1L) %>%
  dplyr::pull("テキストファイルURL") %>%
  ldccr::read_aozora(directory = "cache") %>%
  readr::read_lines()

dplyr::glimpse(text)
#>  chr [1:46] "芸術が必要とする科学" "宮本百合子" "" "" "          一" "" ...
